contentfulSermon.title: 40 Days in the Word: Week 7 - Integrating God's Word Into My Life

fields.notesFormatted:
Psalm 119:20

How to integrate God's word into my life...

  1. Build on it.

    Matthew 7:24

  2. Feed on it.

    Colossians 3:16

    • I receive it with my ears.

    • I read it with my eyes.

    • I study it with my hands and my mouth.

    • I meditate on it with my mind.

    • I remember it with my heart.

  3. Live by it.

    Psalm 1:1-2

    Psalm 119:11

  4. Grow through it.

    Psalm 119:18

    Luke 8

    • Hardened soil = closed mind

    • Shallow soil = superficial mind

    • Soil with weeds = preoccupied mind

    • Good soil = willing mind

  5. Act on it.

    James 1:22

  6. Trust in it.

    Psalm 119:105
